Term.Name: Subtitles in TS
Term.Definition: Subtitles carried in an MPEG-2 Transport Stream.

Term.Name: DVB TTML Subtitles
Term.Definition: DVB TTML subtitles as defined in [ETSI EN 303 560]. TTML subtitle streams packetized for carriage in DVB MPEG-2 transport streams. If no explicit SubtitleCodingFormatCS format is signalled, the default conformance point processor profile applies.

Term.Name: Subtitles in ISOBMFF
Term.Definition: Subtitles encapsulated in ISOBMFF according to ISO/IEC 14496-30.

Term.Name: Standalone subtitle resource
Term.Definition: Subtitle resource carried separately from other content.

Term.Name: Open/In-video subtitles
Term.Definition: Subtitles that make up part of the main video picture.

Term.Name: Other subtitle carriage
Term.Definition: Other method of carrying subtitles not specifically identified in this classification scheme.
